headline.main: U.S. War Materials Are Arriving in Africa; Help to Offset the British Losses in Greece

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, May 2 -- New war material pouring into Africa in recent weeks -- much of it United States-made -- offsets the loss of equipment in Greece, British sources said today.
abstract: Gen A P Wavell reorganizing forces for defense of Middle East against Germans in Africa; Cairo sources rept U S material for Brit arriving in Africa

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
